text: Jacques Fornier (6 November 1926 – 14 November 2020) was a French theatrical actor and director. He founded the Théâtre de Bourgogne and led it for 15 years. He also directed the National Theatre of Strasbourg. He was born in Paris. In 1993, he was honored as Commander of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres. Fornier died 14 November 2020 in Paris, aged 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French theatre directors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Jacques Fornier
